sourcesContent:
import FrameComponent27 from "../components/FrameComponent27"; import GroupComponent3 from "../components/GroupComponent3"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import MainNavbar from "../components/MainNavbar"; import "./Home.css"; const Home = () => { return (
We desire to be the training centre of choice among our target denominations and churches by providing the best training skills that are relevant to society.
We exist to bring maturity to church and transformation to society through equipped leadership based on Christian values and principles by training people in their area of calling
We are More Than A Bible College
4 Reasons Why You’ll Love NPBC
{`Nairobi Pentecostal Bible College `}
Life at NPBC
Your time at NPBC is a great opportunity to discover, develop and deploy your Christian Ministry
Apply for Admission
2023 Applications are now open
Please contact our Admission Office on 0754 569 687 who will be happy to arrange this for you.
For Detailed information, brochures and other forms can be mailed to you upon request.
{`Apply Now `}
{`News & updates `}
{`Questions other `} students are asking
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Question 1
+
Apply Today

{`Become a student at `}

NPBC
New students
New students
New students
New students
New students
New students
Admission Scholarships Care groups Residence
Learn about admission requirements, how to apply, and the next steps once you’ve applied to the NPBC.
Every year, NPBC offers half scholarship for the first 20 applicants in the full time diploma program.
NPBC offers a caring environment for its staff and students where they can relate in a transformational wa
NPBC has housing facilities which can be rented out for residence to the community

{`Bible & Theology `}

Courses

Bachelor of Arts

( Intercultural studies )

Christian Education

Courses

Christian Ministry

Courses
Our Philosophy
Nurturing potential building character
); }; export default Home;
